description: Interactive Plotly Dash dashboard for Pune hourly forecast CSV. Minimalist modern 'liquid' design. Features: date range selector, hour-of-day filter, toggle forecast vs actual (if actuals present), rolling-average smoothing control, hourly heatmap (day vs hour), summary KPIs (mean, max, next-24h forecast), download filtered CSV. Target files: dashboard/app.py, dashboard/assets/style.css, dashboard/requirements.txt, dashboard/README.md. Use Plotly Dash, responsive layout, callbacks for interactivity, and data loading from 'pune_hourly_next_2_days.csv' in project root. Include instructions to run and install.
strategy_description: Use streaming file writer for very large content
